node.title: Christ in Job
node.description: The question of suffering is a timeless one. It shall continually be raised until Jesus comes. The book of Job while providing insight into our pain and potential causes, it also points to a greater answer given in Jesus. Job's story sheds an increasing light on the death and suffering of Jesus. And we find that Christ is in Job. In ways that inspire us bear the troubles of life a bit longer but never alone.
